body:
Hello Avicus,

The Map developers have decided to start removing most of the leather armour on certain maps. All you now got is an leather helmet to show what team you're playing in.
  We decided to change the armour to provide better gameplay with having people making armour. We believe that if people start making armour gameplay will be better, kill farmers won't have it as easy as they did and rushers would actually get a challenge.
  These changes will soon be on the server :)

If you disagree with this, please explain why bellow. We're always listening to you, but please address the issue with somewhat kind words. Don't get too offensive.

Regards.
body_tagged:

replies.body:
Your talking about how it will make kill farming harder but if a teamstack of good pvpers (which is usually how kill farming starts) eliminates most full iron people (if they even try to build armour) since so many people are lazy kill farming will be made much easier for those kill farmers since now your dead, your enclosed by kill farmers and you have less armour than usual to protect yourself in pvp.
There are pros and cons but it seems here if the changes were made for harder kill farming its very flawed.
For rushing people if the player is good enough they take their armour off anyway so its not too much of an effect.
replies.body_tagged:
Your talking about how it will make kill farming harder but if a teamstack of good pvpers (which is usually how kill farming starts) eliminates most full iron people (if they even try to build armour) since so many people are lazy kill farming will be made much easier for those kill farmers since now your dead, your enclosed by kill farmers and you have less armour than usual to protect yourself in pvp.
There are pros and cons but it seems here if the changes were made for harder kill farming its very flawed.
For rushing people if the player is good enough they take their armour off anyway so its not too much of an effect.

replies.body: I really disagree with having only a leather helmet... Robin you said that people will make full iron and have better gameplay but what I'm seeing ATM is people making iron armour and then just camping in their own half as usual. You have a chace to kill these full iron when you have full leather because you have a little bit of protection but with just a leather helmet, you barley have any protection at all and die easily
